author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
It's been a few years since Adam built his sci-fi blaster prop storage trunk, and it's one of Adam's favorite things to let visitors to the cave touch and explore. But since that build, the lights have stopped working and it needs aesthetic upkeeping. So it's time to remove all the props from it and give it a much needed build refresh!

The making of this blaster storage trunk: https://youtu.be/jxDSEulomCg

Shot by Adam Savage and edited by Josh Self
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Adam Savage Updates His Sci-Fi Blaster Storage Vault!
